com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class ConstrainedReshapeHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.ConstrainedReshapeHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReshapeHandler

    public abstract class ConstrainedReshapeHandler
extends Object
implements IReshapeHandler
    A utility implementation of the IReshapeHandler interface that can be used to constrain the reshaping of an existing instance conveniently.
    See Also:
    ConstrainedHandle, ConstrainedPositionHandler, constrainNewBounds(IInputModeContext, RectD, RectD)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ConstrainedReshapeHandler(IReshapeHandler wrappedHandler)
      Initializes a new instance of the ConstrainedReshapeHandler class that delegates to the wrappedHandler.

    • Method Detail

      • cancelReshape

        public final void cancelReshape(IInputModeContext context,
                                RectD originalBounds)
        Cancels the move operation and calls onCanceled(IInputModeContext, RectD).
        Specified by:
        cancelReshape in interface IReshapeHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve information about the drag from.
        originalBounds - The value of the coordinate of the Bounds property at the time of initializeReshape(IInputModeContext).

      • constrainNewBounds

        protected abstract RectD constrainNewBounds(IInputModeContext context,
                                            RectD originalBounds,
                                            RectD newBounds)
        Callback that needs to implement the constraints for the new bounds.
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the reshape will be performed.
        originalBounds - The value of the Bounds property at the time of initializeReshape(IInputModeContext).
        newBounds - The coordinates in the world coordinate system that the client wants the handle to be at. Depending on the implementation the Bounds may or may not be modified to reflect the new value.
        Returns:
        The constrained value of newBounds.

      • getBounds

        public final IRectangle getBounds()
        Delegates to the WrappedHandler's Bounds property.
        Specified by:
        getBounds in interface IReshapeHandler
        Returns:
        The Bounds.

      • getWrappedHandler

        protected final IReshapeHandler getWrappedHandler()
        Gets the wrapped handler to which calls will be ultimately delegated.
        Returns:
        The wrapped handler.

      • handleReshape

        public final void handleReshape(IInputModeContext context,
                                RectD originalBounds,
                                RectD newBounds)
        Handles the reshape operation and subsequently calls onReshaped(IInputModeContext, RectD, RectD).

        This method will use the constrainNewBounds(IInputModeContext, RectD, RectD) callback to let subclasses constrain the reshaping.

        Specified by:
        handleReshape in interface IReshapeHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the reshape will be performed.
        originalBounds - The value of the Bounds property at the time of initializeReshape(IInputModeContext).
        newBounds - The coordinates in the world coordinate system that the client wants to reshape the item to. Depending on the implementation the Bounds may or may not be modified to reflect the new value.

      • initializeReshape

        public final void initializeReshape(IInputModeContext context)
        Initializes the reshape operation and subsequently calls onInitialized(IInputModeContext, RectD).
        Specified by:
        initializeReshape in interface IReshapeHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which the drag will be performed.

      • onCanceled

        Called when the cancelReshape(IInputModeContext, RectD) method has been called.
        Parameters:

        originalBounds - The original bounds.

      • onFinished

        protected void onFinished(IInputModeContext context,

      • onReshaped

        protected void onReshaped(IInputModeContext context,
                          RectD originalBounds,
                          RectD newBounds)
        Called when the handleReshape(IInputModeContext, RectD, RectD) operation has been performed.
        Parameters:
        context - The input mode context.
        originalBounds - The original Bounds.
        newBounds - The new Bounds.

      • reshapeFinished

        public final void reshapeFinished(IInputModeContext context,
                                  RectD originalBounds,
                                  RectD newBounds)
        Handles the finish operation and invokes onFinished(IInputModeContext, RectD, RectD).
        Specified by:
        reshapeFinished in interface IReshapeHandler
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve information about the drag from.
        originalBounds - The value of the Bounds property at the time of initializeReshape(IInputModeContext).
        newBounds - The coordinates in the world coordinate system that the client wants the handle to be at. Depending on the implementation the Bounds may or may not be modified to reflect the new value. This is the same value as delivered in the last invocation of handleReshape(IInputModeContext, RectD, RectD)
